articles.content:
By Julia Hollingsworth, Nectar Gan and CNN staff, CNN
Updated 8:53 PM ET, Fri July 30, 2021

articles.author: Donald Judd
articles.title: Biden nominates Khizr Khan, a Gold Star father and Trump critic, to religious freedom post
articles.description: President Joe Biden announced Friday that he was appointing Khizr Khan, a Gold Star father who drew then-candidate Donald Trump's ire when he spoke at the 2016 Democratic National Convention, to the United States Commission on International Religious Freedom.
articles.content: (CNN)President Joe Biden announced Friday that he was appointing Khizr Khan, a Gold Star father who drew then-candidate Donald Trump's ire when he spoke at the 2016 Democratic National Convention, to… [+1053 chars]
